name: Ushiro - The Somber God of Death
nutshell:
"In exchange for your life, I'll grant you one wish." "Ushiro: the Somber God of Death" is what you get when Japanese horror meets Beetlejuice! Based on a cancelled Level Five game and a series of now popular horror novels written by Gotou Ryu, the manga adapts stories from the novels as faithfully as possible.
Ushiro spends his days looking for people desperate enough to die so he can approach them to convince them to die, so he can eat their souls. Despite how it seems though, he is not completely heartless, offering to grant the people a single wish to come true in exchange for it. However, much to Ushiro's dismay, an upbeat high school girl can actually see him, and on top of that she goes out of her way to convince people not to die. Being drawn together through some kind of string of fate, the two go on to meet several different people who are struggling with hurtful pasts, perverted presents and foul futures, both doing what they can to help.

name: Ichigenme wa Yaruki no Minpou
nutshell: Tamiya meets Tohdou at Teinou University, a school for kids from well-off families. Tamiya is shocked at the different values that Tohdou and his friends have, but begins a curious friendship with them. As graduation nears, the two friends strike up a fledgling love.

name: Hagure Roji
nutshell: In a small alleyway in Higashiyama, Kyoto, there are two boarding houses, and in the alley these form, dubbed "outcast alleyway," there are only two tenants. So one of them, the daughter of the current landlord, pesters the other tenant into helping her gather more residents, specifically other outcasts.

name: Isekai de Shippai Shinai 100 no Houhou
nutshell: To Chie Souma, a female college student, every day feels depressing when she has no luck with job hunting. She’d much rather end up in an alternate universe, just like in her beloved tripping into another world novels… Just as she was dreaming of escaping this reality, one day she actually trips into another world! It might be too dangerous in a female body to survive in this world. Chie decides to use the knowledge that she’s gained from reading, lie about her gender, and become “Souma the scholar,” but—?! A manga adaptation of a strategy manual style fantasy.

name: Genie in the hood
nutshell: In a world where genies live and granted wishes to humans, Sam, a lucky secondary school girl own a genie of….laziness. They live a normal life until, a mysterious and super rich man find and offer Sam to be his friend

name: Judge Lee Han Young
nutshell:
Judge Lee, who believed justice could be realized in the courtroom, did not follow the orders of his superiors and sentenced the conglomerate to life in prison before being killed.
But is it because of the shenanigans he heard as a child ? With all his memories, Lee gets a second life chance.
The world needs him, Lee, the heretic of the judiciary, who knows only justice.

name: Fullmetal Alchemist - Dadward remembers Hohendad
nutshell:
Artist’s Pixiv
 Artist’s Twitter

name: Tropical-Zamurai
nutshell:
宮本武蔵inハワイ!!本邦初、リゾート剣豪漫画新連載!剣の道に疲れた武蔵が、五輪書の印税でロハス生活開始。ユルユルな男たちがユルユルなムードのビーチで繰り広げる、どうでもいい争い。集まれ剣豪ファン!ただし現地集合現地解散だ!
武蔵VS小次郎、世紀の対決の地は巌流島からハワイに変更!?印税で悠々自適な暮らしを始めた武蔵、それを追う小次郎、そして数多の刺客たち、みんなみんな常夏の楽園に大集合新感覚・ゆるゆるリゾート剣豪マンガ‥‥何それ?

name: Dungeon Nursery
nutshell:
Koizumi Takashi (a salary man) dies from slipping on a banana peel. if he can reach the magical Fountain of Purification which resides at the bottom of a difficult dungeon, he will be allowed into Heaven.
But to do that, he needs to conquer the dungeon by summoning monsters.
His first monster was a level 1 female goblin.

name: Hannah Nala
tags: Official Colored,Long Strip,Romance,Slice of Life,Full Color
nutshell: Hannah recently married Nala. Her husband excels in every aspect of the household! And now, Hannah must try to be a good wife. This is the story of a newlywed couple!

name: Messages From the Killer
tags: Long Strip,Romance,Boys' Love,Drama,School Life,Horror,Web Comic,Full Color
nutshell:
There's a serial killer in my WeChat moments!
There seems to be a mysterious large organization behind everything. The only one I can rely on is my buddy who sleeps on my lower bunk.

name: Focus
nutshell: A young photographer, Hirami Yuichi visits an island for an exhibition and meets the gallery's owner, Asahina Jun, with whom he fell in love at first sight. Even with a direct approach, his feelings don't reach the heterosexual Asahina. However, one day, when Asahina discussed his past, he was moved and he hugged Yuichi. Getting closer or staying away, both of them make it hard to leave.

name: Kimi Koi Limit
nutshell:
Back in high school Sono confessed her love to Sato, but she was turned down.
Now she lives as a freeloader in an apartment shared with her girlfriend, Hiroko. However, she still hasn't forget about Sato and when she cries out her name while having sex with Hiroko, she finds herself in some serious trouble…

name: Great Master
nutshell: You don’t have to live in the garbage dump again when you go to the rich woman! Sun Lei left the garbage dump where he had lived for 20 years with the dream of a rich woman.

name: SS
nutshell: The story revolves around Daibutsu, a middle aged former rally driver who lives with his wife Kumiko and their son. Daibutsu is a former rally driver, who used to participate in the All Japan Rally Championship. Daibutsu proceeded to go to his garage to rebuild his, Mitsubishi Starion 4WD, named Jackie, a Group B rally car which was banned at the end of the 1986 season. He then proceeds to sets his return to racing by challenging people on the street with his car.

name: Iron Knight
nutshell:
A boy with a body like steel encounters the "goblin virus" and must now protect his girlfriend.
Included one-shots:

Volume 1: Iron Curtain
Volume 2: Goblin Knight
Volume 3: Iron Knight (pilot)

name: Palm Trees
nutshell: A oneshot from the doujinshi anthology, Utopia Grass (volume 2).

name: How to Make a Woman Fall in Love With You
Coulomb Fille
nutshell: 15-year-old Kanzō Wakai grosses everybody out, thanks to the “dried seaweed hair” he was born with. With adolescence in full bloom, he moved to a new area and ran into a strange girl. Noemi Hokari—she is also troubled by a peculiar condition with which she “cannot touch other people”…! “Dried seaweed weirdo” and “electric girl”. Is their meeting fate?! Or is it…

name: Bakuto
nutshell:
Did you think tohai and Mahjong Club where the only two Mahjong manga's he did? NO he has more and here one form the world of Young King the magazine who brought us the crazy world of Excel Saga to the world of no typical highschool-slice-of-life story with Gang King
This revolves around Baku Ōmura, a hot-blooded young man who attends the private Yagisawa High School. He hates people who break the rules, and as he takes on many of his schoolmates and adults in various games of gambling, he sees through cheating with his wit and skill.

name: Sennen no Yuki
nutshell:
Seventeen-year-old Chiyuki Matsuoka was born with heart problems, and her doctors say she won't live to see the next snow. Touya is an 18-year-old vampire who hates blood and refuses to make the traditional partnership with a human, whose life-giving blood would keep them both alive for a thousand years.
Note: Author decided to go on hiatus from series for Ouran Koukou Host Club.

name: Hokusai
nutshell:
From Ediciones Glénat:
In the 19th century, there lived a painter who formed a large influence upon the French Impressionists - Katsushika Hokusai, the timeless Japanese artist!
Ishinomori offers a complete biography of the 90 years of life of the great ukiyo-e artist, who frequently changed his name and residence and came to call himself Gakyō Rōjin, "the crazy old painter."

name: Room 303
nutshell: Yukimaru and his friends investigate the Shiroyashiki as they look for their missing friends and run into the strange Room 303. - MAL

name: Watashi-tachi no Futekisetsuna Kankei
nutshell: Machimiya and Nanao are in love with each other. Even though their love is mutual, their ages are nine years apart, and they have to do their best to keep this so-called inappropriate relationship a secret…

name: DICE: The Cube That Changes Everything
nutshell:
Dongtae is rock bottom in everything.
Looks, grades, life, everything.
But all that might change.
If you could change your life by playing a game, would you?

Official Collaboration MVs: The Star, Goodbye Juliet by The Rock Diamond
Official Chinese

name: Moving
nutshell: A boy who keeps his powers a secret from others, other people with powers related to "Moving", and a story about their parents. Follow these people as mysterious and troublesome situations arise.

name: Rain Train
nutshell: One-shot webcomic involving a girl, a train, and another person.

name: Let Me Be a Little Closer to You
nutshell:
Every love story will come to an end, but you know, I still want to preserve it as long as I can.
At least so that we can hold each other's hands tightly, hold each other peacefully and remind each other in time that we used to love…

name: Yu-Gi-Oh D Team ZEXAL
nutshell:

name: Denpa Odyssey
nutshell: Hara, a girl who was abandoned by her parents and had been shut up at home for a long time, suddenly comes to school one day. She calls herself a "tourist to the earth," and her eccentric behavior leads to a series of minor incidents involving her friends. Her classmates, who find Hara's inability to read the atmosphere annoying, bully her relentlessly, but...

name: Kyuuso no Chigiri
nutshell:
A rare species called "innocence" may be the kind of animal needed for the world you desire…
One day, a man from a superior caste of fox aristocrats rescues a girl from the lowest caste of mice.
The girl is hiding a big secret that will shake the world…
